attributes.action: ban the import and sale of Foie Gras in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Foie Gras is a shockingly cruel product that is obtained by force-feeding geese and ducks. The production of foie gras is banned in the UK but it is currently legal to import it into the country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
